title: MakerDAO: withdraw max collateral broken when generated DAI is 0

labels.name: Fixed
labels.description: Issue is fixed waiting for merge

body:
Steps to repro:

1. Open a CDP, lock ETH, and draw a little DAI
1. Payback the max amount of DAI
1. Attempt to withdraw the max amount of ETH

On the last step, you get this error:

```

function","name":"TypeError"},"handled":false,"type":"onunhandledrejection"}}]},"platform":"javascript","sdk":{"name":"sentry.javascript.browser","packages":[{"name":"npm:@sentry/browser","version":"5.4.3"}],"version":"5.4.3","integrations":["InboundFilters","FunctionToString","TryCatch","Breadcrumbs","GlobalHandlers","LinkedErrors","UserAgent","Vue"]},"environment":"web","release":"5.0.14-hotfix.2","event_id":"d0e311636ee94ad38ea0eaeb0bf0be14","request":{"url":"https://www.myetherwallet.com/interface/dapps/maker-dai/manage/interface","headers":{"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/75.0.3770.100 Safari/537.36"}},"tags":{"network":"ETH","service":"myetherwallet.com","walletType":"keepkey"}}
```

I suspect it's because the collateralization ratio becomes infinite when you pay back all of your DAI.

Best guess is that this line:

https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/blob/53b90e2da8f6e067135b1195173178e799ba4712/src/dapps/MakerDai/MakerCDP.js#L454

needs to be:

```
if (ethQty <= 0 || daiQty <= 0) return toBigNumber(0);
```

Since it returns a `number` in one case, but a `BigNumber` in the other.

Same here: https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/blob/53b90e2da8f6e067135b1195173178e799ba4712/src/dapps/MakerDai/MakerCDP.js#L459
